title: Pancakes with Syrup
shortDescription: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
description: Start your morning with a delightful breakfast of fluffy, golden-brown pancakes topped with a drizzle of premium maple syrup. Garnished with freshly picked berries, this breakfast option is both hearty and wholesome.

title: Classic Eggs Benedict
shortDescription: Perfectly poached eggs on English muffins with creamy hollandaise.
description: A classic breakfast dish featuring poached eggs served on a toasted English muffin, topped with buttery hollandaise sauce and your choice of smoked salmon or ham.

title: Avocado Toast
shortDescription: Fresh avocado spread on artisan bread topped with poached eggs.
description: A trendy and healthy breakfast featuring creamy avocado spread generously on freshly toasted artisan bread, garnished with olive oil, chili flakes, and a sprinkle of salt. Optional poached eggs are available to complete your meal.

title: French Croissant with Butter
shortDescription: Classic flaky butter croissant served warm.
description: Straight from the patisserie, these croissants are baked to perfection with a golden, flaky crust and a soft buttery interior. Served warm, they pair beautifully with coffee or tea.

title: Smoothie Bowl
shortDescription: Colorful smoothie bowl topped with fresh fruits, nuts, and seeds.
description: This healthy and vibrant breakfast bowl is made with a base of blended fruits like berries, bananas, and spinach, topped with granola, chia seeds, and fresh fruit slices for added crunch and nutrition.

title: Breakfast Burrito
shortDescription: Stuffed with scrambled eggs, veggies, and melted cheese.
description: A flavorful and filling breakfast option, this burrito is packed with scrambled eggs, sautéed vegetables, crispy bacon, and melted cheese, all wrapped in a soft tortilla.

title: Caesar Salad with Grilled Chicken
shortDescription: A classic Caesar salad topped with tender grilled chicken slices.
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing topped with marinated grilled chicken slices. A healthy and delicious lunch option for any day.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
shortDescription: Traditional spaghetti with a hearty Bolognese meat sauce.
description: This comforting Italian dish features perfectly cooked spaghetti smothered in a rich, slow-cooked tomato and beef Bolognese sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Wrap
shortDescription: Spiced chicken tikka wrapped in a soft flatbread with fresh veggies.
description: Succulent pieces of chicken tikka, lettuce, onions, and a drizzle of yogurt sauce wrapped in a warm, soft flatbread. This wrap is packed with flavor and perfect for lunch.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
shortDescription: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried with tofu and a savory sauce.
description: Fresh and crunchy vegetables like bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots stir-fried with tofu in a light soy-ginger sauce, served over a bed of jasmine rice. A satisfying vegetarian meal.

title: Turkey Club Sandwich
shortDescription: Classic turkey club sandwich with crispy bacon and fresh vegetables.
description: Layers of smoked turkey, crispy bacon, lettuce, and tomato stacked between slices of toasted whole-grain bread, served with a side of potato chips or salad.

title: Beef Burrito Bowl
shortDescription: Flavorful beef burrito bowl with rice, beans, and fresh toppings.
description: Savory seasoned ground beef served over a bed of fluffy rice and black beans, topped with salsa, guacamole, shredded cheese, and sour cream. A complete and hearty lunch meal.

title: Grilled Salmon with Asparagus
shortDescription: Perfectly grilled salmon served with a side of roasted asparagus.
description: This elegant dinner features a succulent grilled salmon fillet served alongside tender asparagus spears, drizzled with lemon butter. It's a deliciously light yet satisfying dish for any occasion.

title: Beef Wellington
shortDescription: Classic beef Wellington with a flavorful mushroom duxelles and pastry crust.
description: A true gourmet meal, Beef Wellington features a tender beef fillet coated with a rich mushroom duxelles and wrapped in a golden, flaky pastry. Perfect for an elegant dinner party or special occasion.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
shortDescription: Creamy Alfredo pasta with grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, and a rich sauce.
description: Comfort food at its finest, Chicken Alfredo features tender grilled chicken atop a bed of fettuccine pasta smothered in a creamy Alfredo sauce, garnished with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.

title: Lamb Chops with Mint Sauce
shortDescription: Delicately seasoned lamb chops paired with a refreshing mint sauce.
description: These grilled lamb chops are marinated in aromatic herbs and spices, then seared to perfection. Served with a homemade mint sauce, this dish is a flavorful, tender choice for a satisfying dinner.

title: Vegetable Lasagna
shortDescription: Hearty vegetable lasagna made with fresh vegetables, cheese, and marinara sauce.
description: A vegetarian twist on the classic, this vegetable lasagna layers fresh spinach, zucchini, mushrooms, and ricotta cheese between sheets of pasta, then is topped with marinara sauce and mozzarella. A perfect dinner for anyone looking to enjoy a comforting and meat-free meal.

title: Shrimp Scampi
shortDescription: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter and lemon served over spaghetti.
description: Shrimp Scampi is a classic dish with shrimp cooked in a buttery garlic sauce, accented with a splash of lemon and fresh parsley. Served over a bed of pasta for a flavorful and indulgent dinner.
